title: Did the deceased have any other siblings who have the same parents?
question: Did {deceasedName} have any other siblings who have the same parents?
paragraph1: We need to know about all siblings {deceasedName} had who have the same parents, including any siblings who:
listItem1: were legally adopted or given up for adoption by both parents
listItem2: have died, either before or after {deceasedName}
paragraph2: This does not include any step-siblings or siblings who only have one parent in common (half-siblings).

anyOtherWholeSiblings.required: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} had any other siblings who have the same parents
